meta.title: Dino Game AI
meta.description: Artificial Intelligence used to beat the infamous dinosaur game.

blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: This project is quite similar to my Flappy Bird AI. It was lots of fun and I continue to love coding with AI or neural networks.

blocks.title: Technical
blocks.text: This was a visualization of the NEAT algorithm at work, learning how to play the infamous Dino Game. It was all coded in python, and shown using Pygame. It is using the NEAT-Python module, which does most of the heavy lifting for me, but gives a great introduction to the basics of neural networks.
